name: Dirt Track American Racing
description:
The only real Dirt Track off-road race game on IOS. Drive without limits to win the game! Experience the thrill and excitement as you race on one of the best dirt track bike off road race ever created. Challenge your skills to some of the most technical racing on mobile, these cars aren't for the faint of heart. Realistic looking venues and cars, immerse yourself in the stunning 3D graphics!
If you are a Dirt Track fan, this is the game you've been waiting for!

- 10 Tracks
-Daytona Speedway
-Lucas Oil Speedway
-Fairbury American Legion Speedway
-Brownstown Speedway
-Kentucky Lake Motor Speedway
-USA Raceway
-Atomic Speedway
-Portsmouth Raceway Park
-Gateway Dirt Nationals
and more..

Game Features:
- Realistic car Controls.
- Late Models, Street Stocks
- Car Customization for Latest Models
- Real World Drivers
- Control the way you want: you can touch or tilt to steer
- Touch Arrows
- Tilt Steering
- Eye catching laptime tracker at the top of the screen, always know how you match up
- Highly competitive AI
- Great game play, sounds and graphics?
- Awesome fast paced action?
- 10 visually amazing and challenging Tracks
- Simple,Smooth and effective Controls
- Astonishing physics brings chaos to another level
- Intelligent enemies driving beautiful racing cars
- Highly detailed 3D Graphics

Get Dirt Track American Racing today, and find out what everyone is raving about!

Give it a try, you won't regret it!
